name: Cathy Wang
bio:
Cathy is always looking for ways to apply design thinking to solve complex problems. She builds businesses and open new markets based on the belief that the design thinking can really change the world.

Cathy is currently the Director of Experience Strategy at [EPAM Empathy Lab](http://empathylab.epam.com/). Based in London helping to grow a global practice while overseeing work throughout Europe. Prior to this, Cathy has worked in agencies like [Frog](http://www.frogdesign.com/) and [Fjord](https://www.fjordnet.com/).
